channel.title: Open Source Cities - Montréal
channel.description: Recent content on Open Source Cities - Montréal

item.title: OSMTL#2 ipfs.pics + lightning talks!
item.description: Let’s get together along with the group of people already united around https://github.com/opensourcecities/montreal to share some ideas and start interesting open source related discussions :) This month we’ll have Vincent Cloutier sharing his experience working on ipfs.pics: ipfs.pics is getting reborn! ipfs.pics is an open-source photo sharing system with undeletable pictures (think of it as the anti-snapchat), that became quite large before overwhelming its creators with stars (900 stars on github), memes (russian), and porn (obviously).

item.title: Let's get this started!
item.description: Let’s get together along with the group of people already united around https://github.com/opensourcecities/montreal to share some ideas and start interesting open source related discussions :) We’ll have 2 presentations to be announced soon (will update this description as soon as it’s confirmed) but the most important thing is to get there and finally meet this amazing group of people and help decide what direction do we want to take with this meetup.
